participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Cheerful and friendly, enjoys sharing experiences and making connections with others.
participant_1.background: I go to Comic Con and play with animals in my free time. I enjoy singing. I like simple jokes. I am a huge fan of dogs. I cannot get enough gummy worms to satisfy my sweet tooth.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Creative and adventurous, loves to explore new cultures and express herself through crafts.
participant_2.background: I have a family who works in the retail industry, so I often get discounts on my favorite clothes. I like going to foreign countries. I love to crochet. I'm a twentysomething female who enjoys horror movies and rock music. My social media presence is mostly for my job search, but I do enjoy interacting with friends and family online.

content.text: Not much, just got back from Comic Con. It was fun!
Oh cool, I've always wanted to go to one. What was the best part?
I loved meeting all the people in costume, and seeing all the cool artwork.
That sounds awesome! I love horror movies, so I would have loved to see all the costumes.
Yeah, there were a lot of great ones. I especially liked the one of Pennywise from IT.
I love that movie! It's so creepy.
I know, right? It's one of my favorites.
Do you like other Stephen King movies?
Yeah, I love The Shining and The Shawshank Redemption.
Those are both great movies! I'm more of a horror movie fan, but I can appreciate a good drama.
Me too! I love all kinds of movies, really.
Same here! I think it's important to be open to all kinds of different things.
I agree. That's what makes life so much fun!
